about_the_game:
Intermediate Equipment Set



Mia Cloth x1
Shisanara Shirt x1
Kelgar Coat x1
Galsh Boots x1
Shoir Oxfords x1
Bayerna Boots x1

*Rare Intermediate Equipment for Lin, Roger and Sonia.
*Low chance of being dropped from enemies.
*If you have already obtained this equipment, you will receive a Premium Material instead.
detailed_description:

*If you have already obtained this equipment, you will receive a Premium Material instead.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft® Windows® 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

supported_languages: English, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Spanish - Spain, Spanish - Latin America
